description:
Illustrator CS6 offers a large array of tools for creating, manipulating, and adjusting your graphics. One of the most challenging aspects of using Illustrator can be figuring out where to begin.

This video is perfect for new users to Illustrator or designers would like to learn the new features of CS6. These concise, engaging lessons show the programâ€™s key features and tools in action, from creating multiple artboards to printing or posting your final work.
title: Illustrator CS6: Video QuickStart
